title: Top 10 Free macOS Apps for Productivity
description:
For past few months, I’ve been building a list of free productivity apps for macOS. And I finally have a solid list, which I’m really excited to share with you guys.

Download link

Itsycal https://www.mowglii.com/itsycal/

Copia http://www.dollaropath.com/copia/

Pearl https://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/57802/pearl

Be Focused https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pomodoro-time-focus-timer/id973134470?ign-mpt=uo%3D8

Timeout https://itunes.apple.com/in/app/time-out-break-reminders/id402592703?mt=12

Usage - battery health monitor https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/battery-health-monitor-battery-stats-and-usage/id490192174?mt=12

Quitter https://marco.org/2016/05/02/quitter

Monosnap  https://itunes.apple.com/in/app/monosnap/id540348655?mt=12

Space launch https://spacelauncherapp.com/

Cleaner for Memory https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cleaner-for-memory/id748212890?mt=12

You can reach me here

What camera do I use? 
Canon 70D

What mic do I use?
Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)

What tripod do I use?
Manfrotto MVKBFR

What video editor do I use?
Final Cut Pro

What computer do I use?
iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
